title: Solana Breaks All-Time High at $264 â€“ Overtakes BNB as Third Largest Cryptocurrency
shortdescription: SOL surges 800% in 2024 as meme coins, DeFi, and institutional adoption drive network activity to record levels.
author: Emma Chen

content.content: Solana shattered its previous all-time high on December 18, 2024, reaching $264 and cementing its position as the third-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization with over $120 billion in value. The rally represents an 800% gain in 2024, marking one of the most spectacular comebacks in crypto history after the FTX collapse sent SOL below $10 in late 2022. According to The Block, Solana now processes over 5,000 transactions per second with fees remaining under $0.01, making it the preferred platform for high-frequency trading, NFTs, and the explosive meme coin sector. The network hosts over 20 million active addresses and has surpassed Ethereum in daily transaction volume, with decentralized exchanges like Jupiter and Raydium processing billions in trading volume daily. Institutional interest has surged following rumors of a Solana spot ETF filing, while the Solana Mobile Saga phone sold out in 24 hours, demonstrating consumer demand for crypto-native hardware and applications.
Meme Coins and DeFi Fuel Growth

Solana's ecosystem has exploded with activity in 2024, driven primarily by meme coin mania and sophisticated DeFi protocols. As reported by CoinDesk, tokens like Bonk, Dogwifhat, and dozens of others have generated billions in trading volume on Solana DEXs, attracting a new generation of retail traders who appreciate low fees and fast settlement. Beyond memes, serious DeFi protocols have emerged with Jito's liquid staking capturing $2 billion in TVL, Marinade Finance dominating validator staking, and lending protocols like Solend and Marginfi providing institutional-grade leverage. The network's technical improvements, including the Firedancer client from Jump Crypto promising 1 million TPS, position Solana as a serious competitor to Ethereum for the next generation of decentralized applications. With ETF speculation heating up and no signs of network congestion despite record activity, analysts predict SOL could reach $300-$400 if crypto market conditions remain favorable through 2025.
